input: {{word: Hello}}; {{sentence: The mysterious artifact was discovered}}
evaluation:
The chatbot output provides two part-of-speech tags: "CC: Coordinating conjunction" and "DT: Determiner". According to the task description, the chatbot should return only the part of speech tag, not the explanatory text that follows it. This means that the expected output should be either "CC" or "DT", depending on what was requested by the input, but certainly not both at the same time nor with descriptive text.

The output violates the task guideline because it includes descriptive text after each tag, which is not compliant with the instruction to return only the part of speech tag. Furthermore, two tags were provided, while the task specifies returning just a single tag corresponding to the word's part of speech, or "Unknown" or "CantAnswer" if applicable.
